description:
PyCon Colombia 2020 is the fourth version of the national Python conference in Colombia, This year PyCon Colombia returns with great guests from different countries, who will be happy to share their ideas, experiences and knowledge with all the attendees. 

See you this February 7, 8 and 9 at the EAFIT University of Medellín.

Some important stats about PyCon Colombia are:

3 days of conference with 6 Keynote speakers, more than 30 Speakers of diverse subjects, more than 15 workshops, and many more activities.

learn more about PyCon Colombia 2020 on our website.

https://www.pycon.co/

There you will find more information about our speakers, talks, organizers, and sponsors.

Do not forget to follow us on our social networks, so, you will not miss any updates.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pyconcolombia
Twitter: https://twitter.com/pyconcolombia
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pyconcolombia/
Telegram: https://t.me/pyconcolombia
LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/company/pycon-colombia/
title: Promo PyCon Colombia 2020
